tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (PP (IN From) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN bottom)) (PP (IN of) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN heart))))) (, ,) (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP hope) (SBAR (S (NP (PRP$ your) (NN hair)) (VP (VP (VBZ falls) (PRT (RP out))) (CC and) (VP (VBZ dies)))))) (. .)))
